name: Sphaera
description:
Sphaera is a game about relaxation and exploration in a huge grass field filled with animals.

You play as a small sphere, awaken as God's creation along with animals where you can collect and let them be part of yours.

Key Features



Day/Night Cycle - God said, "Let lights appear in the sky to separate the day from the night. Let them be signs to mark the seasons, days, and years.





Collect! Collect! Collect!



Animals - Take a screenshot worthy moment with the animals. Nvidia Ansel supported.
